snippet.title: Huntdown Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
In the mayhem-filled streets of the future where criminal gangs rule and cops fear to tread, only the bounty hunters can free the city from the corrupt fist of felony. Lay waste to the criminal underworld and make a killing in this hard boiled action comedy arcade shooter.

Huntdown is available to Purchase here:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9msr27kf1q22
Epic Games Store: https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/huntdown/home
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/huntdown-switch/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/sv-se/product/EP4837-CUSA12064_00-HUNTDOWN00000001

Huntdown Social Media
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/HuntdownGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/huntdowngame
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/Cwn8mFM
